Course.Name: Bioinformatics Imaging
Course.Description: This course provides an introduction to the physical and computational principles of medical imaging systems. Topics covered include fundamentals of x-ray radiography, x-ray computed tomography, ultrasound imaging and magnetic resonance imaging. Current techniques for visualization, segmentation, and analysis of medical image data will be discussed.
Course.Prerequisite: CSCI 3333 or CMPE 3333 or Consent of the instructor
